details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 5 Version identification - Part number
details.description: The value of pdfuaid:part shall be the part number of the International Standard to which the file conforms

rule.description: The value of pdfuaid:part shall be the part number of the International Standard to which the file conforms

error.message: The "part" property of the PDF/UA Identification Schema is %1 instead of 2 for PDF/UA-2 conforming file
